input.sentences: [female] was out of ideas for her next art project so she decided to look at some old family photos .
she looked at old images of her mother and her mother 's sisters .
[female] was stunned when she saw an old picture of her grandmother that looked almost exactly like herself .
an old wartime photo of her father was just the inspiration she needed to start her art project .
[female] finished her artwork | inspired by the old photos of her family .
output.sentences: The child sat smiling in the photo.
Three childred are sitting on a couch in the photo.
A smiling woman is seen in her wedding dress.
A stoical man is posing for a picture in military uniform.
An illustration of a young couple riding in a motorboat.
